00039 NumericalQM::NumericalQM( QualityMetric* real_metric,
00040                           bool numerical_gradient,
00041                           bool numerical_hessian )
00042   : realMetric(real_metric),
00043     numericGrad(numerical_gradient),
00044     numericHess(numerical_hessian)
00045 {}

00069 bool NumericalQM::evaluate_with_indices( PatchData& pd,
00070                                          size_t handle,
00071                                          double& value,
00072                                          std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00073                                          MsqError& err )
00074   { return realMetric->evaluate_with_indices( pd, handle, value, indices, err ); }
00075 
00076 bool NumericalQM::evaluate_with_gradient( PatchData& pd,
00077                                           size_t handle,
00078                                           double& value,
00079                                           std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00080                                           std::vector<Vector3D>& gradient,
00081                                           MsqError& err )
00082 {
00083   if (numericGrad) 
00084     return realMetric->QualityMetric::evaluate_with_gradient( pd, 
00085                                                               handle,
00086                                                               value,
00087                                                               indices,
00088                                                               gradient, 
00089                                                               err );
00090   else
00091     return realMetric->evaluate_with_gradient( pd, 
00092                                                handle,
00093                                                value,
00094                                                indices,
00095                                                gradient, 
00096                                                err );
00097 }

00099 bool NumericalQM::evaluate_with_Hessian_diagonal( PatchData& pd,
00100                                       size_t handle,
00101                                       double& value,
00102                                       std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00103                                       std::vector<Vector3D>& gradient,
00104                                       std::vector<SymMatrix3D>& hess,
00105                                       MsqError& err )
00106 {
00107   if (numericHess) 
00108     return realMetric->QualityMetric::evaluate_with_Hessian_diagonal( pd, 
00109                                                                handle,
00110                                                                value,
00111                                                                indices,
00112                                                                gradient, 
00113                                                                hess,
00114                                                                err );
00115   else
00116     return realMetric->evaluate_with_Hessian_diagonal( pd, 
00117                                                        handle,
00118                                                        value,
00119                                                        indices,
00120                                                        gradient, 
00121                                                        hess,
00122                                                        err );
00123 }
